chapters.title: Chapter 15: Gathering Darkness
chapters.info: Lord Lir Baryn, p. 361 (431)—“Whip of a man” who always wears a sword. He was one of the nobles who opposed Morgase during the Succession. Slender and strong, he is the High Seat of House Baryn. He was exiled from the Palace except for official functions by Morgase after she took the Lion Throne, but he invited himself back when Rand forced Gaebril out of town. He has since been exiled again by Elayne.
